Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Provides tax credit to certain volunteer firefighters, volunteer ambulance workers and volunteer emergency medical personnel
Summary: Provides tax credit to certain volunteer firefighters, volunteer ambulance workers and volunteer emergency medical service personnel of up to one thousand one hundred dollars for qualifying service; defines "qualifying service".
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to providing tax credits to volunteer firefighters, volunteer ambulance workers and volunteer emergency medical personnel under certain circumstances
